ingredients: All-purpose flour:1¾ cups;Sugar:2 cups;Cocoa powder:¾ cup;Baking soda:2 tsp;Baking powder:1 tsp;Salt:1 tsp;Eggs:2 large;Buttermilk:1 cup;Hot coffee:1 cup;Vegetable oil:½ cup;Vanilla extract:2 tsp
recipe_steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease two 9-inch round pans;In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, and salt;In another bowl, beat eggs, then add buttermilk, oil, and vanilla;Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix until combined;Gradually stir in hot coffee (batter will be thin);Divide batter evenly between prepared pans;Bake for 30-35 minutes until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean;Cool in pans for 10 minutes, then turn out onto wire racks;Cool completely before frosting
protein_g: A rich and moist chocolate cake perfect for celebrations and chocolate lovers

ingredients: All-purpose flour:2 cups;Water:⅓ cup;Salt:½ tsp;Chicken mince:200g;Onion:½ cup, finely chopped;Celery:2 tbsp, finely chopped;Spring onion:½ cup, finely chopped;Ginger:½ tsp, finely chopped;Garlic:½ tsp, finely chopped;Oyster sauce:1 tbsp;Cornflour:1 tsp;Black pepper:¼ tsp
recipe_steps: Make dough by mixing flour, salt and lukewarm water until smooth;Cover dough and rest for 20 minutes;Mix chicken mince with onions, celery, spring onions, ginger, garlic, oyster sauce, cornflour, salt and pepper;Knead dough and divide into small portions of 7g each;Roll each portion into thin circles;Place 1 tsp filling in center of each circle;Pleat edges and seal to form momo shape;Steam in a steamer for 10-12 minutes until cooked through;Serve hot with spicy tomato chutney
protein_g: Traditional Asian dumplings with thin wrapper and flavorful chicken filling

ingredients: Chicken quarters:2 lbs;Plain yogurt:1 cup;Ginger:1 inch, minced;Garlic:2 cloves, minced;Cumin:1 tsp;Cinnamon:1 tsp;Garam masala:1 tsp;Ground coriander:1 tsp;Salt:1 tsp;Smoked paprika:1 tsp;Olive oil:1 tbsp
recipe_steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C);In a mixing bowl, mix together ginger, garlic, cumin, cinnamon, garam masala, ground coriander, smoked paprika, salt, olive oil, and plain yogurt;Pat dry the chicken then add to a large mixing bowl;Add marinade and mix well until all chicken is completely coated;Either cover and marinate for up to one day or let sit for 10 minutes at room temperature;Place tin foil on two wire racks and remove each piece of chicken from bowl, shaking off excess marinade;Bake for 20-25 minutes until they begin to char around edges and internal temperature reaches 165°F;Allow chicken to rest for 5 minutes before serving
protein_g: Authentic Indian grilled chicken marinated in yogurt and aromatic spices

ingredients: Pilao rice:300g;Chicken:500g, chopped into pieces;Salt:to taste;Liquid milk:1 cup;Yogurt:½ cup;Onion:1 large, finely chopped;Cardamom:2;Cinnamon:2;Bay leaf:1;Ginger paste:1 tsp;Garlic paste:1 tsp;Cumin powder:1 tsp;Coriander powder:1 tsp;Soybean oil:4 tbsp
recipe_steps: Soak rice in water while preparing other ingredients;Slice onions lengthwise and prepare ginger-garlic paste;Cut chicken into small pieces and mix with yogurt;Heat oil in round-bottom pot over medium heat;Add chopped onions and fry for 3-4 minutes without browning;Add ginger paste, garlic paste, salt, cumin powder and coriander powder, mix well;Add cinnamon, cardamom and bay leaf to the pot;Add yogurt-mixed chicken and spices, mix very well;Wait until chicken changes to light brown color (5-6 minutes) then add milk;Add rice to chicken gravy with enough water so water level is 1 inch higher than rice;Cover pot and cook on low flame until rice is cooked;Add green chili and black pepper before serving;Serve hot
protein_g: Fragrant layered rice dish with tender spiced chicken and aromatic basmati rice

ingredients: Pizza dough:1 ball;Pizza sauce:¼ cup;Mozzarella cheese:1⅓ cups, freshly grated;Pepperoni:20 slices, cut 3mm thick;Onion:⅓ cup, cut 0.5cm thick;Bacon:⅓ cup, cut into pieces;Capsicum:½ cup, sliced 0.5cm thick;Button mushrooms:⅓ cup, cut 3mm thick;Black olives:¼ cup, sliced
recipe_steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C);Roll out pizza dough on floured surface to 12-inch circle;Transfer dough to pizza stone or baking sheet;Spread pizza sauce evenly, leaving 1-inch border for crust;Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over sauce;Add desired toppings: pepperoni, onions, bacon, capsicum, mushrooms, olives;Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper;Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly;Remove from oven and let cool for 2 minutes;Slice and serve hot
protein_g: Classic Italian flatbread topped with cheese and various toppings

ingredients: Minced beef:500g;Onion:½ medium, diced;Egg:1;Sage and onion stuffing:3 tbsp;Salt:to taste;Black pepper:to taste;Chili flakes:to taste;Haloumi cheese:100g, sliced;Burger buns:4;Lettuce:1 cup, shredded;Tomato:1 large, sliced;Mayonnaise:2 tbsp;Ketchup:2 tbsp;Sweet chili sauce:1 tbsp
recipe_steps: Dice half an onion finely;Add minced beef to mixing bowl;Add sage and onion stuffing or breadcrumbs;Season with salt, pepper and chili flakes;Add egg and mix thoroughly with hands;Divide mixture into equal portions and form into patties;Cook haloumi cheese slices in lightly oiled pan until golden;Cook burger patties in lightly oiled pan for 3-4 minutes each side;Toast burger buns if desired;Spread mayo, ketchup and sweet chili sauce on buns;Layer with lettuce, tomato, burger patty and haloumi cheese;Assemble burger and serve with chips
protein_g: Juicy beef patty with cheese and fresh toppings in a soft bun

ingredients: Ripe mangoes:2 large, peeled and chopped;Milk:1 cup, chilled;Sugar:2 tbsp;Vanilla ice cream:2 scoops;Ice cubes:6-8;Cardamom powder:¼ tsp;Pistachios:1 tbsp, chopped for garnish
recipe_steps: Peel and chop ripe mangoes into small pieces;Add mango pieces to blender;Pour in chilled milk;Add sugar according to taste;Add vanilla ice cream scoops;Add ice cubes for extra chill;Add cardamom powder for flavor;Blend all ingredients until smooth and creamy;Taste and adjust sugar if needed;Pour into tall glasses;Garnish with chopped pistachios;Serve immediately while cold
protein_g: Refreshing tropical drink made with ripe mangoes and creamy milk

ingredients: Egg noodles:400g;Chicken breast:300g, sliced;Vegetables:2 cups mixed (carrots, cabbage, bell peppers);Soy sauce:3 tbsp;Oyster sauce:2 tbsp;Garlic:4 cloves, minced;Ginger:1 tbsp, grated;Vegetable oil:3 tbsp;Spring onions:3 stalks, chopped;Sesame oil:1 tsp;Salt:to taste;Black pepper:½ tsp
recipe_steps: Boil egg noodles according to package instructions until al dente, drain and set aside;Slice chicken breast into thin strips;Prepare all vegetables by cutting into uniform pieces;Heat oil in large wok or pan over high heat;Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds;Add chicken and cook until no longer pink;Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp;Add cooked noodles to the pan;Pour soy sauce and oyster sauce over noodles;Toss everything together for 2-3 minutes;Drizzle with sesame oil and garnish with spring onions;Season with salt and pepper, serve hot
protein_g: Savory stir-fried noodles with chicken and fresh vegetables

ingredients: Potatoes:4 large;Vegetable oil:for deep frying;Salt:to taste;Black pepper:½ tsp;Paprika:½ tsp;Garlic powder:½ tsp
recipe_steps: Wash and peel potatoes;Cut potatoes into uniform fries, about ½ inch thick;Soak cut fries in cold water for 30 minutes to remove excess starch;Pat fries completely dry with paper towels;Heat oil to 350°F (175°C) in deep fryer or large pot;Fry potatoes in small batches for 3-4 minutes (first frying);Remove and drain on paper towels;Increase oil temperature to 375°F (190°C);Fry again for 2-3 minutes until golden brown and crispy;Drain on paper towels and season immediately with salt, pepper, paprika and garlic powder;Serve hot with ketchup or mayo
protein_g: Golden crispy potato fries seasoned with salt and spices

ingredients: Eggs:4 large;Water:enough to cover eggs;Salt:1 tsp;Ice water:for cooling
recipe_steps: Place eggs in a single layer in saucepan;Add enough cold water to cover eggs by 1 inch;Add salt to water;Bring water to rolling boil over high heat;Once boiling, remove pan from heat and cover;Let eggs sit in hot water for desired time: 4-6 minutes for soft-boiled, 8-10 minutes for hard-boiled;Prepare bowl of ice water;Using slotted spoon, transfer eggs to ice water to stop cooking;Let cool for 2-3 minutes;Gently tap and peel eggs under cool running water;Serve immediately or store in refrigerator
protein_g: Simple boiled eggs perfect for breakfast or as protein addition to meals

ingredients: Bread slices:4;Butter:2 tbsp;Cheese slices:2;Ham or turkey:4 slices;Lettuce:2 leaves;Tomato:1 medium, sliced;Onion:¼ medium, sliced;Mayonnaise:1 tbsp;Mustard:1 tsp;Salt:to taste;Black pepper:to taste
recipe_steps: Toast bread slices until golden brown if desired;Spread butter on one side of each bread slice;Spread mayonnaise and mustard on two slices;Layer lettuce leaves on buttered side;Add cheese slices over lettuce;Layer ham or turkey slices;Add tomato and onion slices;Season with salt and pepper;Top with remaining bread slices, buttered side down;Press gently and cut diagonally;Secure with toothpicks if needed;Serve immediately with chips or salad
protein_g: Classic sandwich with fresh ingredients and your choice of fillings

ingredients: Chicken or vegetables:500g;Onions:2 large, chopped;Tomatoes:3 medium, chopped;Garlic:6 cloves, minced;Ginger:2 tbsp, grated;Curry powder:2 tbsp;Turmeric:1 tsp;Cumin seeds:1 tsp;Coriander seeds:1 tsp;Coconut milk:400ml;Vegetable oil:3 tbsp;Salt:to taste;Fresh cilantro:for garnish;Green chilies:2, slit
recipe_steps: Heat oil in large pan over medium heat;Add cumin and coriander seeds, let them splutter;Add chopped onions and cook until golden brown;Add minced garlic and grated ginger, cook for 1 minute;Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft and mushy;Add curry powder, turmeric, and salt, cook for 2 minutes;Add chicken or vegetables and mix well to coat with spices;Cook for 5-7 minutes until chicken changes color;Pour coconut milk and bring to gentle simmer;Add green chilies and simmer for 20-25 minutes until chicken is cooked through;Adjust seasoning with salt;Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or bread
protein_g: Flavorful Indian curry with aromatic spices in rich coconut milk base

ingredients: Penne pasta:1½ cups;Olive oil:2½ tbsp;Cumin seeds:½ tsp;Garlic:3 cloves, minced;Ginger:½ inch, grated;Onions:½ cup, chopped;Tomatoes:1¼ cups, chopped;Carrots:½ cup, chopped;Green peas:¼ cup;Bell pepper:¼ cup, chopped;Salt:¾ tsp;Red chili powder:½ tsp;Garam masala:½ tsp;Kasuri methi:1 tbsp;Cream:2-3 tbsp;Coriander leaves:2 tbsp, chopped
recipe_steps: Boil 6 cups water with 1 tsp salt, add pasta and cook until al dente;Reserve 3-4 tbsp pasta water and drain pasta, rinse with cold water;Heat 1 tbsp oil in pan, add cumin seeds and let them splutter;Add minced garlic and ginger, sauté for 30 seconds;Add chopped onions and cook until translucent;Add tomatoes and cook until soft and mushy;Add carrots, peas, and bell peppers, cook for 3-4 minutes;Add salt, red chili powder, and garam masala;Add cooked pasta and mix well;Add pasta water if needed for consistency;Stir in cream and kasuri methi;Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot
protein_g: Indian-style pasta with aromatic spices and fresh vegetables in creamy tomato base

ingredients: All-purpose flour:2 cups;Oil:4 tbsp + for deep frying;Salt:1 tsp;Water:6-7 tbsp;Potatoes:4 large, boiled and cubed;Green peas:½ cup;Onions:1 medium, finely chopped;Ginger:1 tbsp, grated;Green chilies:2, finely chopped;Cumin seeds:1 tsp;Coriander seeds:1 tsp;Turmeric powder:½ tsp;Red chili powder:1 tsp;Garam masala:1 tsp;Coriander leaves:2 tbsp, chopped;Lemon juice:1 tbsp
recipe_steps: Make dough by mixing flour, 4 tbsp oil, salt and water until smooth;Cover and rest for 30 minutes;Heat 2 tbsp oil in pan, add cumin and coriander seeds;Add chopped onions and sauté until golden;Add ginger and green chilies, cook for 1 minute;Add boiled potatoes and green peas;Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala and salt;Mix well and cook for 5 minutes;Add coriander leaves and lemon juice, let filling cool;Divide dough into small balls and roll into ovals;Cut each oval in half and form cone shapes;Fill with potato mixture and seal edges with water;Heat oil to 350°F and deep fry samosas until golden brown;Serve hot with mint chutney
protein_g: Crispy triangular pastries filled with spiced potato and pea mixture

ingredients: Whole wheat flour:2 cups;Water:¾ cup;Salt:1 tsp;Oil:2 tbsp;Potatoes:4 medium, boiled and mashed;Onions:1 small, finely chopped;Green chilies:2, finely chopped;Ginger:1 tsp, grated;Cumin powder:½ tsp;Coriander powder:½ tsp;Red chili powder:½ tsp;Garam masala:½ tsp;Coriander leaves:2 tbsp, chopped;Ghee or butter:for cooking
recipe_steps: Make dough by mixing flour, salt, oil and water until smooth;Knead well and rest for 20 minutes;Mix mashed potatoes with onions, green chilies, ginger and all spices;Add chopped coriander leaves to potato mixture;Divide dough into portions and roll into small circles;Place potato filling in center of each circle;Gather edges and seal, then gently roll into flatbread;Heat tawa or griddle over medium heat;Cook paratha for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form;Flip and cook other side for 2 minutes;Apply ghee on both sides and cook until golden spots appear;Serve hot with yogurt, pickle and butter
protein_g: Traditional Indian stuffed flatbread filled with spiced mashed potatoes
